definitions.definition: A person or thing that shakes , or by means of which something is shaken.
One who holds railroad spikes while they are hammered .
A musical percussion instrument filled with granular solids which produce a rhythmic sound when shaken.
A kind of straight-sided, stackable glass for beer , soda , etc.

main_definition: A person or thing that shakes , or by means of which something is shaken.
secondary_definitions: One who holds railroad spikes while they are hammered .
A musical percussion instrument filled with granular solids which produce a rhythmic sound when shaken.
A kind of straight-sided, stackable glass for beer , soda , etc.
